title: Getting punished for getting stacks as Cho'Gath
body:
It has come to my attention that when i reach a level of stacks on my ult as Cho'Gath, my range is increased to the level where my E do not reach the enemy if they are running. 

Plz fix this somehow

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=BEST MEAT BALLS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zjN2qMRu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-25T21:52:12.436+0000)
>
> what punishment ??

Cho gath gets increased auto attack range the more stacks he has therefore the enemy can outrun his E spikes if he attacks at max range, atleast I think that's what he is saying...


You can easily overcome this by right clicking behind the enemy then auto attacking them after you are well within range.
He shouldn't have to though? if this is true maybe the missile speed needs to be increased just a tid bit to compensate?
